colorTheory.description: A harmonious palette inspired by the resume content, balancing professional and modern tones.
colorTheory.mood: The colors convey a sense of professionalism with a modern touch.
colorTheory.accessibility: The palette ensures good readability and accessibility compliance with high contrast text colors.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The primary color (teal) stands out as the main brand color, complemented by a clean white background and dark secondary text colors for emphasis.
